comments:
Working in Linux with the IBM 1.5 VM.  Version I20070501-0010.

When I inspect the following line of code, the popup appears with the text in red.  If the top level element is expanded, the text j cannot be resolved appears.  However, the line the text is on keeps switching (line 1, then line 2, then line 1, and so on).

I will attach a screenshot of the popup with the text on the second line, with a blank line above it.





This error occured when terminating:

eclipse.buildId=I20070501-0010
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.5.0 IBM J9 2.3 Linux x86-32 j9vmxi3223-20070201 (JIT enabled)
J9VM - 20070131_11312_lHdSMR
JIT  - 20070109_1805ifx1_r8
GC   - 200701_09

Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86 -startup /home/cwindatt/downloads/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070427.jar

Error
Tue May 01 09:41:12 CDT 2007
Exception processing async thread queue

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIVoidValue.<init>(JDIVoidValue.java:26)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIDebugTarget.voidValue(JDIDebugTarget.java:1762)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.engine.Interpreter.getResult(Interpreter.java:102)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.engine.ASTEvaluationEngine$EvalRunnable.run(ASTEvaluationEngine.java:523)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIThread$ThreadJob.run(JDIThread.java:2595)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

The line I was inspecting was:

stringArrayVar[j] = "(" + j + ")";
The method is adding strings to an array.

Ignore the exception I included in the report, it requires different steps to reproduce.
This is a regression from M6. Looks like the viewer can't handle two 'equal' children for the same parent. Fix is in ExpressionContentProvdier - only return unique error messages, avoiding dups.
